turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I need to book a flight from New York (JFK) to Los Angeles (LAX) sometime next week, preferably non-stop. I'm flexible with the exact dates, but I'd like to leave in the afternoon if possible. Can you check for me?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Let me see what's available for non-stop flights from JFK to LAX departing next week in the afternoon. Could you provide a range of dates you are considering? This will help narrow down the search and find the best options for you.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, fine. How about anytime between Tuesday and Thursday? Also, what are your policies regarding flight changes after booking? I might need to move it later, just in case. This is so stressful!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, searching for non-stop flights from JFK to LAX departing between next Tuesday and Thursday in the afternoon. Regarding flight changes, policies vary depending on the airline and fare class you choose. Generally, basic economy tickets have limited or no change options, while main cabin or higher fares usually allow changes for a fee, plus any fare difference. I will show you options with different change policies once I have found suitable flights. To clarify, are you looking for the *cheapest* flights available within the specified dates or do you have other preferences like preferred airlines?
